Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small CommutativeDimonoid Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small CommutativeDimonoid AllSmallCommutativeDimonoid is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic commutativedimonoid models from orders 2 to 6.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .

Definition of CommutativeDimonoid formulas(CommutativeDimonoid).
(x * y) + z = x * (y + z).
(x + y) + z = x + (y * z).
(x + y) * z = x * (y * z).
x + y = y + x.
x * y = y * x.
end_of_list.
Dependency This package has dependencies on the Magmaut package.
